question: What is the name of the tree planting campaign recently launched by Union Culture Ministry?
explanation:
The Union Culture Minister Prahlad Singh Patel announced a tree planting campaign called Sankalp Parva.
The Minister said that the campaign follows the Prime Ministerâ€™s announcement to plant five trees either in Office campus or any other place, to improve the environment of the country. The Ministry has decided to celebrate Sankalp Parva from 28th June to 12 July 2020. All its offices, attached institutions would also participate in this campaign.
